channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as Adam Jones, Monica Dolan, Dom Wood and Dick McCourt take on a Chaser in a bid to win thousands of pounds for their chosen charities. S13 Ep12.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Britain's Got Talent
channel.desc: The must-see Series 18 grand finale - only one act can bag a life-changing 250,000-pound cash prize and a spot on the bill of the 2025 Royal Variety Performance. S18 Ep14.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Fake
channel.desc: Love Kitten: Gripping drama series. Birdie is elated to attend Anton's wedding with Joe, but their plans are derailed when Joe urgently needs funds for a property deposit. S1 Ep5.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The World's End
channel.desc: Sci-fi comedy film starring Simon Pegg and Nick Frost, 2013. Five friends recreate an epic pub crawl from 20 years earlier, but not everything about their home town is as it seems.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shop on TV
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: For the Love of Dogs with Alison Hammond
channel.desc: Alison has her work cut out with a giddy bulldog cross pup, a lively Frenchie needs to rest after a leg injury, and a Bernese mountain dog fears almost everything. S13 Ep5.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: For the Love of Dogs with Alison Hammond
channel.desc: Alison meets a rare Romanian Mioritic Shepherd with a fear of stairs and doorways, and there is chaos when a van with seven Belgian Shepherd cross puppies arrives. S13 Ep6.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Unwind with ITV
channel.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Gary Barlow's Food and Wine Tour
channel.desc: Melbourne - Victoria: Travel series. Gary meets long-time friend Dannii Minogue in Melbourne as they have an award-winning cup of coffee and visit the MCG. S1 Ep2.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Raymond Blanc's Royal Kitchen Gardens
channel.desc: Highgrove: Raymond visits a very special house and garden in Highgrove, a beloved home to King Charles III with impressive gardens and educational centres. S1 Ep5.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: James Martin's Saturday Morning
channel.desc: James is joined by singer Louise Redknapp while tasting mouth-watering recipes from chefs Francesco Mazzei and Tom Shepherd and cooking nettles with Alysia Greenwood. S8 Ep22.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Katie Piper's Weekend Escape
channel.desc: Katie is joined by actor Fiona Wade, Michael Douglas and Genevieve Turley transform an endometriosis campaigner, and Aldo Zilli rustles up some mocktails before taking an ice bath. S1 Ep7.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
channel.desc: Joining Alan at Manor Farm this time are Anita Dobson, Tom Allen, and Amol Rajan to provide the cheer and the chat while we have a spot of camel racing too.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Alan Titchmarsh's Gardening Club
channel.desc: Gardening advice series. Alan showcases his wildflower meadow, and Jason Williams explores one of Europe's most ambitious horticultural projects. S2 Ep11.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Jeremy Pang's Hong Kong Kitchen
channel.desc: Simon Rimmer: Jeremy invites best friend and chef Simon Rimmer on a trip down memory lane as he shows him the sights of his old family holidays and tastes of nostalgia. S1 Ep2.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
channel.desc: Spy comedy film sequel starring Rowan Atkinson and Ben Miller, 2018. Johnny English comes out of retirement to find an evil hacker who has endangered Britain's undercover agents.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Goldfinger
channel.desc: Iconic Bond film starring Sean Connery and Honor Blackman, 1964. 007 uncovers a plot to contaminate the gold reserve at Fort Knox while investigating a decadent gold smuggler.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as actress Su Pollard, dancer Jordan Banjo, TV presenter AJ Odudu and TV legend Jonathan Ross take on the challenge to win thousands for their chosen charities. S11 Ep3.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the classic game show with Charlie Hedges, Luke Kempner, and Jeremy Vine all trying to guess well-known phrases from animated clues.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: It'll Be Alright on the Night
channel.desc: David Walliams celebrates the funniest behind-the-scenes bloopers and live broadcast blunders from shows including Strictly Come Dancing, Blankety Blank, and Coronation Street.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Code of Silence
channel.desc: Suspenseful crime drama. Alison discovers Liam's betrayal and races to stop the gang's heist - chaos erupts as lives are endangered and Alison is forced to confront the fallout. S1 Ep5.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.
